sentences.en: A four - barrel smoke grenade launcher is mounted on each side of the turret.
sentences.cn: 在炮塔每侧安装一具四管烟榴弹发射器.

sentences.en: A slipping gear could let your M 203 grenade launcher fire when you least expect it.
sentences.cn: 粗心大意会令你的M203榴弹发射器在你最不想它开火的时候开火.

sentences.en: Aim Make a the direction and technology for developing automatic grenade launcher in our country.
sentences.cn: 目的研究我国自动榴弹发射器的发展方向及技术途径.

sentences.en: All five - second grenade fusewill burn down in three seconds.
sentences.cn: 所有定制为五秒的手雷导火索都会在三秒内烧完.

sentences.en: Ash rolled, turned, and chucked a grenade as three Sentinel pairs streaked over him.
sentences.cn: 亚什滚动, 转身, 把一颗手雷扔向紧紧跟着他的三对哨兵.

sentences.en: Blow 100 enemies into a million little pieces with a grenade launcher in Multiplayer.
sentences.cn: 在多人游戏模式下用枪榴弹发射器将100个敌人炸成100万个小碎片.

sentences.en: But Miranda would jump on a paint grenade for me.
sentences.cn: 但换是米兰达也会为我掩护的.

sentences.en: Immediately after throwing a tear - gas grenade at the policemen, the recidivist absconded with the money.
sentences.cn: 该惯犯向警察投掷了一颗催泪弹, 借机携款潜逃.

sentences.en: Kiwi is hand grenade of cancer - fighting antioxidants, including itamin C, itamin E, lutein, and copper.
sentences.cn: 猕猴桃含有少量抵抗癌症的抗氧化剂成分, 包括维生素C 、 维生素E 、 叶黄素及微量元素铜.

sentences.en: The car was hit by a grenade.
The MV Faina's cargo, which includes grenade launchers and 33 Russian - made tanks, had provoked international concern.
sentences.cn: 这艘货船的装载物已经引起国际广泛关注:包括榴弹发射装载以及33辆俄制坦克.

sentences.en: The rod and grenade were propelled from the rifle by a blank cartridge.
sentences.cn: 连杆和发射器被空弹从步枪上推出.

sentences.en: The Type 27 Grenade Discharger also launched deadly grenades into the enemy formation.
sentences.cn: 二七式掷弹筒,也不断的向敌军投射.

sentences.en: Unlike the standard QBZ 95 assault rifle, the ARC 95 cannot be attached with a grenade launcher.
sentences.cn: 不像标准的QBZ95突击步枪, ARC95不能够增加使用一具榴弹发射器.

sentences.en: Will stood on the opposite side, a grenade in each hand, ready to throw.
sentences.cn: 威尔站在相反的一边, 每只手拿着一颗手雷, 准备扔了.

trans.tran_en: a small bomb that can be thrown by hand or fired from a gun

trans.tran_cn: 扔手榴弹；用催泪弹攻击
